articles.description: The union says it is re-examining its relationship with Labour over the long-running dispute.

articles.description: Marc Lamah, dropped by a private provider, continues to operate on NHS patients in Brighton.
articles.title: Surgeon dropped from private practice works at NHS hospital

articles.description: Yorkshire Water boss Nicola Shaw says the ban will last until the reservoirs have been "recharged".
articles.title: Yorkshire Water hosepipe ban 'to last until winter' says boss

articles.description: The economy shrank by 0.1%, the second month in a row it has contracted.
articles.title: UK economy shrank unexpectedly in May

articles.description: Author Irvine Welsh has written a sequel called Men in Love, because the world is "so full of hate".
articles.title: Trainspotting author Irvine Welsh says AI has made us dumbed down machines

articles.title: Cash Isas: No imminent change to tax-free allowance

articles.description: Scientists have been racing to discover the origins of 3I/Atlas since it was spotted last week.
articles.title: 3I/Atlas: Mystery interstellar object could be the oldest known comet

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Growing demand for IVF treatments is stoking some optimism in South Korea's demographic crisis.
articles.title: South Korea has the world's lowest birth rate, but fertility clinics are booming

articles.description: The US singer attends a hearing in London over two charges relating to an alleged nightclub attack.

articles.title: Sunderland care home crash: Two residents die
